titles.title: A resolution designating June 23, 2024, as "Social Media Harms Victim Remembrance Day".
A resolution designating June 23, 2024, as "Social Media Harms Victim Remembrance Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution designates June 23, 2024, as Social Media Harms Victim Remembrance Day and encourages government, industry, and community stakeholders to take action to prevent social media-related harm.
